Chinese.name: SpringBoot
Chinese.description: 使用 SCF 部署 Spring Boot 并通过 API 网关测试事件模拟请求和获取 spring 返回的处理结构。请使用 API Gateway 事件模版并将 path 改为 /hello 进行模拟测试。
Chinese.attention: 请使用 API Gateway 事件模版并将 path 改为 /hello 进行模拟测试。

English.name: SpringBoot
English.description: Use SCF to deploy Spring Boot and test event simulation requests through the API gateway and obtain the processing structure returned by Spring
English.attention: You can use the API Gateway event template and change the path to /hello for simulation testing.
